sentence.romaji: kare ha uwasa wo uchikeshita wa yo
sentence.english: He denied the rumor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yubisasu

sentence.kanji: みんなが彼の指差す方を見たんだ。
sentence.romaji: minna ga kare no yubisasu hou wo mitanda
sentence.english: Everyone looked in the direction he pointed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shugi

sentence.kanji: 私は車は持たない主義です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kuruma ha motanai shugi desu
sentence.english: I do not have a car on principle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's giri

sentence.kanji: 彼は義理を大切にしています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha giri wo taisetsu ni shite imasu
sentence.english: He values duty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gikai

sentence.romaji: gikai de ku no rainen no yotei ga hanashiawareta n da 。
sentence.english: The council discussed the district's plan for the upcoming year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gidai

sentence.kanji: 今日の議題は面白そうです。
sentence.romaji: kyou no gidai ha omoshiro sou desu
sentence.english: Today's agenda looks interesting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakai

sentence.romaji: kare ha gakai de ronbun wo hapyou shita yo
sentence.english: He presented a paper in an academic conference.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hansuru

sentence.kanji: 彼の行いはモラルに反しています。
sentence.romaji: kare no okonai ha moraru ni hanshite imasu
sentence.english: What he is doing goes against morals.

sentence.romaji: kaijou ha hito de ipai ni narimashita
sentence.english: The hall was filled with people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gozonji

sentence.kanji: 彼の名前をご存じですか。
sentence.romaji: kare no namae wo gozonji desu ka
sentence.english: Do you know his name?

sentence.english: Do you know where the post office is?

sentence.english: I did exercise with machines in the gym.

sentence.english: Our company was established ten years ago.

sentence.romaji: kanojo ha yoi hannou wo shimeshita wa

sentence.romaji: kare ha sarani shitsumon wo tsuzuketa no

sentence.english: My father has the responsibility to support the family.

sentence.romaji: kare ha fuensu ni yorikakata no 。
sentence.english: He leant against the fence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiki

sentence.kanji: 彼がそのプロジェクトの指揮を取ったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ga sono purojiekuto no shiki wo tota no
sentence.english: He took the initiative on that project.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keikai

sentence.kanji: 地震のあとは津波に警戒してください。
sentence.romaji: jishin no ato ha tsunami ni keikai shite kudasai
sentence.english: Beware of tsunamis after an earthquake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hankan

sentence.kanji: 俺たちは彼の言動に反感を持ったね。
sentence.romaji: oretachi ha kare no gendou ni hankan wo mota ne
sentence.english: We had negative feelings towards his conduct.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsukau

sentence.kanji: この荷物は丁寧に扱って下さい。
sentence.romaji: kono nimotsu ha teinei ni atsukate kudasai
sentence.english: Please handle this luggage with care.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ayashii

sentence.kanji: その男の行動は怪しかったわ。
sentence.romaji: sono otoko no koudou ha ayashikata wa
sentence.english: That man's behavior was suspicious.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ayashimu

sentence.kanji: 警察はそのグループを怪しんでいます。
sentence.romaji: keisatsu ha sono guru-pu wo ayashinde imasu
sentence.english: The police are suspicious of the group.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuudai

sentence.kanji: 雄大な景色に感動したの。
sentence.romaji: yuudai na keshiki ni kandou shita no
sentence.english: I was impressed by the magnificent scenery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toutatsu

sentence.kanji: ついに山頂に到達しました。
sentence.romaji: tsuini sanchou ni toutatsu shimashita
sentence.english: We finally reached the top of the mountain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shougakukin

sentence.kanji: 彼女は奨学金で大学に行きました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha shougakukin de daigaku ni ikimashita
sentence.english: She went to university on a scholarship.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osu

sentence.kanji: うちの猫は雄です。
sentence.romaji: uchi no neko ha osu desu
sentence.english: Our cat is a male.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawaigaru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は猫を可愛がっています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha neko wo kawaigate imasu
sentence.english: She cherishes her cat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ganjou

sentence.kanji: 錠を頑丈なものに替えました。
sentence.romaji: jou wo ganjou na mono ni kaemashita
sentence.english: The lock was substituted for a stronger one.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futago

sentence.kanji: 友達に双子が生まれたよ。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi ni futago ga umareta yo
sentence.english: My friend gave birth to twins.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daku

sentence.kanji: 祖母がうちの猫を抱いているわよ。
sentence.romaji: sobo ga uchi no neko wo daite iru wa yo
sentence.english: Grandma's holding our cat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meiji

sentence.kanji: 祖父は明治の生まれです。
sentence.romaji: sofu ha meiji no umare desu
sentence.english: My grandfather was born in the Meiji era.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tearai

sentence.kanji: 風邪をひかないように手洗いとうがいをしましょう。
sentence.romaji: kaze wo hikanai you ni tearai to ugai wo shimashou
sentence.english: Make sure you wash your hands and gargle to avoid catching a cold.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ukaberu

sentence.kanji: お風呂に花を浮かべて入ったの。
sentence.romaji: ofuro ni hana wo ukabete haita no
sentence.english: I floated some flowers in the bath and then got in.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sennuki

sentence.kanji: 栓抜きはどこですか。
sentence.romaji: sennuki ha doko desu ka
sentence.english: Where's the bottle opener?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiromaru

sentence.kanji: その噂はすぐに広まったよ。
sentence.romaji: sono uwasa ha sugu ni hiromata yo
sentence.english: The rumor spread quickly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiromeru

sentence.kanji: 誰が噂を広めたんだろう。
sentence.romaji: dare ga uwasa wo hirometa n darou
sentence.english: Who spread the rumor?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakusai

sentence.kanji: 彼女は白菜の漬物が好きです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hakusai no tsukemono ga suki desu
sentence.english: She likes pickled nappa cabbage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keibetsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は彼を軽蔑していたの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kare wo keibetsu shite ita no
sentence.english: She despised him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakayubi

sentence.kanji: 中指をドアに挟んでしまった。
sentence.romaji: nakayubi wo doa ni hasande shimata
sentence.english: I caught my middle finger in the door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ageru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は夕食に天ぷらを揚げました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha yuushoku ni tenpura wo agemashita
sentence.english: She fried some tempura for dinner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は拳銃で撃たれたわ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kenjuu de utareta wa
sentence.english: He was shot with a handgun.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osamaru

sentence.kanji: 咳が少し治まりました。
sentence.romaji: seki ga sukoshi osamarimashita
sentence.english: My cough is a little better.

cards.english: meet, have the honor of seeing
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omenikakaru

sentence.kanji: お目に掛かれて嬉しいです。
sentence.romaji: omenikakarete ureshii desu
sentence.english: I am very pleased to meet you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aimai

sentence.kanji: 彼女は曖昧な返事をしたね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha aimai na henji wo shita ne
sentence.english: She gave a vague answer.
